items.sentence: Tom backed his car up to check, but the raccoon that he'd run over was as dead as a doornail.
Tom broke up with Mary before her birthday so he wouldn't have to buy her a birthday present.
Even though Mary has turned him down three times already, Tom plans to propose to Mary again.
Rwandan rebels are pushing their offensive south as fighting continues in the capital Kigali.
Tom underwent plastic surgery and changed his identity to evade capture and start a new life.
